data.what_is: Acquia Marketing Cloud seamlessly integrates with any third-party system and enables easy configuration of any business criteria directly into the platform. Built to be leveraged by all teams who need access to customer data, Acquia Marketing Cloud supports the business across domains, brands, geographies, and websites. Increase marketing agility while future-proofing your business for whatever comes next. Gain flexibility to meet consumers' changing needs while increasing inter-departmental efficiencies.
data.product_description: Acquia Customer Data Platform unifies content and customer data into one tool so organizations can deliver in-context, personalized experiences across channels and devices to drive engagement, conversions, and loyalty.

initial_reviews.review_title: Crafting the Perfect Message with Acquia CDP
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
One of the most important ways we use Acquia's CDP is to improve customer segmentation and marketing message customization. Since the CDP aggregates data from the various platforms we connect with customers (in-store, online, social, in-person events, etc.), we can create highly customized messages for our customers that encourage omnichannel engagement - which we've found to be the single best predictor of return customers and higher lifetime value.
We were able to explore the factors behind complex trends like customer lifetime transaction count by taking advantage of the incredible machine learning tools that Acquia provides. It's difficult to overemphasize just how useful it is to be able to manipulate and analyze your entire CDP using models you can build, test, and modify yourself.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The one limitation I've found with Acquia's CDP has been data ingestion - particularly when trying to send data from another service into Acquia.
Exporting data from Acquia couldn't be simpler (with SFTP and S3 output files you can customize yourself), but Acquia doesn't currently allow you to set up new data sources into the CDP on your own, instead requiring you to go through their support team. They have recently added a Workato integration, which is great for automatically setting up connections with larger, more commonly used platforms, but that still leaves a gap for niche/customized data sources. I know Acquia has been moving towards adding more self-service features, so hopefully this is one they will eventually include.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Acquia's CDP has been an incredible resource for hand-tailoring messages to customers' unique needs. Since Acquia allows you to ingest data from a variety of sources, create highly refined filters for selecting only specific subsets of customers, and then automatically export relevant data to your ESP, it has vastly improved our ability to target specific customers, thus ensuring that they get all the information they need, while not inundating them with superfluous messages.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
I like the ease of use and the speed to which users can pick up basic skills. There is a lot of flexibility built into this out of box which is nice since you can't always plan for everything. The campaign builder has enough options included where you can build around potential limitations with a little creativity. Form and email creation is intuitive and doesn't require engineering resources to maintain. Additionally, I like that the cloud UI is clearly not an afterthought. It has a clean design and organization which makes it easy to move around in.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
As with any system there are inherent bugs or limitations. I haven't encountered anything yet that has prevented the goal from being accomplished, but have had to think outside the box a little. Additionally there are some basic functionality tasks that aren't as intuitive as you would expect, for example manually adding a single contact to a segment.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
If you are looking for a lightweight marketing automation platform that can be maintained without extensive technical resources, this is definitely a great option to consider.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are currently using this for news alerts. This is inclusive of housing the email template, contact lists and utilization of the API for triggering mail sends. In addition, we also use focus items on various sites as well as tracking to build multichannel profiles on users within a clients ecosphere. The ability to have this type of configuration done in a system as intuitive as this allows for non technical resources to be able to assist in strategy and implementation of campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: I like the ease of use and the speed to which users can pick up basic skills. There is a lot of flexibility built into this out of box which is nice since you can't always plan for everything. The campaign builder has enough options included where you can build around potential limitations with a little creativity. Form and email creation is intuitive and doesn't require engineering resources to maintain. Additionally, I like that the cloud UI is clearly not an afterthought. It has a clean design and organization which makes it easy to move around in.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: As with any system there are inherent bugs or limitations. I haven't encountered anything yet that has prevented the goal from being accomplished, but have had to think outside the box a little. Additionally there are some basic functionality tasks that aren't as intuitive as you would expect, for example manually adding a single contact to a segment.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
review_question_answers.answer: If you are looking for a lightweight marketing automation platform that can be maintained without extensive technical resources, this is definitely a great option to consider.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are currently using this for news alerts. This is inclusive of housing the email template, contact lists and utilization of the API for triggering mail sends. In addition, we also use focus items on various sites as well as tracking to build multichannel profiles on users within a clients ecosphere. The ability to have this type of configuration done in a system as intuitive as this allows for non technical resources to be able to assist in strategy and implementation of campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Crafting the Perfect Message with Acquia CDP
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
One of the most important ways we use Acquia's CDP is to improve customer segmentation and marketing message customization. Since the CDP aggregates data from the various platforms we connect with customers (in-store, online, social, in-person events, etc.), we can create highly customized messages for our customers that encourage omnichannel engagement - which we've found to be the single best predictor of return customers and higher lifetime value.
We were able to explore the factors behind complex trends like customer lifetime transaction count by taking advantage of the incredible machine learning tools that Acquia provides. It's difficult to overemphasize just how useful it is to be able to manipulate and analyze your entire CDP using models you can build, test, and modify yourself.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The one limitation I've found with Acquia's CDP has been data ingestion - particularly when trying to send data from another service into Acquia.
Exporting data from Acquia couldn't be simpler (with SFTP and S3 output files you can customize yourself), but Acquia doesn't currently allow you to set up new data sources into the CDP on your own, instead requiring you to go through their support team. They have recently added a Workato integration, which is great for automatically setting up connections with larger, more commonly used platforms, but that still leaves a gap for niche/customized data sources. I know Acquia has been moving towards adding more self-service features, so hopefully this is one they will eventually include.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Acquia's CDP has been an incredible resource for hand-tailoring messages to customers' unique needs. Since Acquia allows you to ingest data from a variety of sources, create highly refined filters for selecting only specific subsets of customers, and then automatically export relevant data to your ESP, it has vastly improved our ability to target specific customers, thus ensuring that they get all the information they need, while not inundating them with superfluous messages.

all_reviews.review_title: Strong solution to many problems
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
I like the ease of use and the speed to which users can pick up basic skills. There is a lot of flexibility built into this out of box which is nice since you can't always plan for everything. The campaign builder has enough options included where you can build around potential limitations with a little creativity. Form and email creation is intuitive and doesn't require engineering resources to maintain. Additionally, I like that the cloud UI is clearly not an afterthought. It has a clean design and organization which makes it easy to move around in.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
As with any system there are inherent bugs or limitations. I haven't encountered anything yet that has prevented the goal from being accomplished, but have had to think outside the box a little. Additionally there are some basic functionality tasks that aren't as intuitive as you would expect, for example manually adding a single contact to a segment.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
If you are looking for a lightweight marketing automation platform that can be maintained without extensive technical resources, this is definitely a great option to consider.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are currently using this for news alerts. This is inclusive of housing the email template, contact lists and utilization of the API for triggering mail sends. In addition, we also use focus items on various sites as well as tracking to build multichannel profiles on users within a clients ecosphere. The ability to have this type of configuration done in a system as intuitive as this allows for non technical resources to be able to assist in strategy and implementation of campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Acquia Lift off! Great product, even better results!
Best open source email marketing automation tool
Nascent technology with a yet to materialize product roadmap
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Honestly, there isn't really much that I like about the product.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The promised roadmap has yet to materialize. For example, the team has been promising machine learning or some type of algorithmic content recommendations for years, but don't seem to be anywhere near ready to release that.

Additionally, it's much more complicated to create experiences that it needs to be.

Last, the analytics don't make it very easy to determine whether or not the experiments actually drive the business results we care about.

In short, I'm unable to create the personalization experiences that I want (recommendation engine) or see the effectiveness of our efforts (analytics).

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
I would look at other vendors with a more mature product.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are attempting to personalize to a mix of known and unknown users. Within the segments, I want both rules-based and algorithmic experiences so that I can set somethings and let the machine figure out the rest.

all_reviews.review_title: Very easy to use with user profiles!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
One of the aspects that make Acquia Lift stand out from the crowd of personalization platforms is that it stores user profiles.  Having profiles allows us to create segments of users to target for personalizations based on historical engagement and behavior on the website.  The profiles also allow us to enrich the data using APIs from other data sources.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Some of the challenges we had have been overcome in the newest release which we are currently in progress of upgrading to.  There are some configuration changes we need to make to accommodate the upgrade, but all configurable from the admin.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
Definitely worth evaluating and strongly consider the impact of user profiles.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Acquia Lift provides us the ability to personalize elements on our website based on audience segments which we define.  The audience segment criteria builder is very robust and easy to use with multi-level/grouped boolean operators.

all_reviews.review_title: Great personalization tool. Not great for A/B testing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
I have used Acquia Lift for about a year now. The best thing about Lift is it is simple to create segments within the tool based off of data you collect on the website. Personalization can get complicated so having an easy tool that can help prioritize personalization views makes the tool streamline and fast.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Originally I thought Lift could be a replacement for A/B testing software but after attempting it several time it just didn't work like I thought it would. I would not recommend using Lift as a replacement A/B testing tool until they update the tool

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
I have used Acquia Lift for about a year now and so far my experience has been good. The best thing about Lift is it is simple to create segments within the tool based off of data you collect on the website. Personalization can get complicated so having an easy tool that can help prioritize personalization views makes the tool streamline and fast.

Acquia Lift are improving their platform and have already made set up much easier than in the past. I think they still need to improve the analytical side of the software or find a way to integrate with other analytical softwares.

Originally I thought Lift could be a replacement for A/B testing software but after attempting it several time it just didn't work like I thought it would. I would not recommend using Lift as a replacement A/B testing tool until they update the tool.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalizing the experience on the website for key persona groups and what stage they are in the buying funnel. We did see a lift in conversions & site traffic. It took a while to realize this because Lift don't do the best job showing the analytics.

all_reviews.review_title: Good personalization tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
It's easy to use and non-technical users can easily launch experiences with it. It's compatible with Drupal, making it super convenient if you are operating a website on Drupal. The account team is super helpful, willing to jump on a call to help you out or provide you with how-tos, docs, etc. that fit your use case and needs. The account team is really invested in making you and your experiences successful.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The analytics for Lift is not that great, the reports are hard to navigate and at times buggy. In order to be a superior product, compared to the competition, Lift really needs to improve their analytics, making it more visual and easier to navigate. In addition, they need to better ensure that the data coming through is accurate, as at times we were unsure if it was accurate or not. Additionally, we ran into multiple bugs in the process of launching some experiences.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalization for the website. We were able to personalize multiple webpages and deliver a unique experience to users, based on different criteria that we set, such as geo or data from our Marketing database.

all_reviews.review_title: Lots of potential
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The advanced reporting and data metrics available within the interface. This provided valuable insight to our team. Acquia's support team was very helpful and knowledgeable.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The overall cost of the product, which is what became a determining factor for us on whether to continue with the product.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
Take in consideration the size of your web team and services. We underestimated the amount of staff that would be needed to fully utilize this product to get the most of what we paid over the course of the contract. We would have loved to have gotten more out of it but the timing we choose was too hectic as we purchased this product when we rebuilt our main marketing website with Drupal and the rebuilt took the majority of our resources and in the end there wasn't much availability of our team to dedicate to Acquia Lift in the way that we had originally hoped to. Long story short we took on too much too fast and I believe if we would have waited a few years into our website rebuilt the overall experience with Lift could have been a lot better. Plus Lift has changed and improved a lot since we originally purchased the product. At some point I would like to give Lift another try but until our staffing and budget increases I just don't see a way we could try it again.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The ability to track user experience throughout the site. The endless options for personal customization. Required a substantial amount of web developer time and efforts to setup and configure.

all_reviews.review_title: Your most inexpensive option, if you're a developer and a very patient person.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
On a self-hosted platform, you have more control over how to structure data passing through to Mautic. Since it can be a self-hosted platform, it's the most inexpensive way to run email by far. If you have a good developer in your team to help you with set up from the backend and can help you troubleshoot, I would say this is a good platform to run if you are okay with running into annoying bugs. There's a great community that supports the cause too. Your true cost is just running the servers.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
There are a lot of bugs whenever they launch an updated version and a lot of bugs in general. I haven't been able to time my campaign sends appropriately - it goes off at varying times. There are a lot of little annoying bugs and workarounds that other ESPs have resolved years ago such as email throttling. You have to adjust the cron job and other levers before being able to throttle email - even then, you have to throttle your whole email program itself rather than just one campaign.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
Only if you have a great developer on your team or if you are one yourself. This platform is not for your average email marketer and they need to be very well-versed in.

all_reviews.review_title: A comprehensive open source marketing automation software, but has its problems
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
The first time I saw information about Mautic was searching for apps in Bitnami,  an industry leader in application packaging, a few years ago. I stayed with the idea of, some day,  test the software.

Finally, four months ago, I could install Mautic in my own server. I  had some problems in the process, but the effort  paid off.

The software has everything you need to make full marketing automation. You can create contacts, segment them, create landing pages, forms,  emails campaigns and so on. The campaign builder is very good and intuitive.

I saw in Mautic, in the near future, a real player in the competitive world of marketing automation providers.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Well. Here are the no so good stuff. Like I said before, I had some problems in the installation process. I had to create a custom php.ini file, and finally the software was installed.

About the functionality, I have to say Mautic has a lot of bugs (I installed the version 2.9.2). In forms, for example,  because they hang on submit button after hit submit,. As well as no error message when submitting forms with missing required fields.

Also, the uptate process is a bit tricky. You need to erase manually the cache, before you can proceed to the update.

Other issue is the lack of integration with Zapier.

I stayed with the impression that Mautic has many more bugs than I face. I don't know if the latest version has fix some of them, but I have to say, I will not use the software if remains like that.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
If you have the time and energy to deal with bugs, go ahead, use this open source version of  Mautic. I think is better to wait for Mautic until it is completely stable and reliable, like, for example, WordPress, a solid software.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Basically, you will save a lot of time, segmenting prospects, and sending them automated custom email campaigns. Very useful tool. But, at the same time, you will need someone to deal with bugs.

open-source, easy to install, minimum server requirements

Email builder could be better. Some functions take more clicks than needed.

Open source version requires fairly extensive knowledge of hosting knowledge and administration, so hire a pro to install it and help you set it up. Mautic is packed full of features normally found in high-end software and platforms. The ability to do A/B (split) testing within the app is great.

Campaigns (automated workflows) are very flexible.

New features and enhancements are driven by the community of users and introduced regularly..

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Being open-source, support is limited to the community through a forum and GitHub repository.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
Pay attention to the installation, especially the cron jobs, and be prepared to find workarounds for some advanced features. All in all, Mautic is worth paying for - but you don't need to.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I've used Mautic extensively within my own company and also with clients. In all cases I have found it to be a very reliable email marketing platform and the zero-cost (aside from hosting fees) means a substantial saving over other, similar solutions such as Hubspot and MailChimp.

all_reviews.review_title: Mautic helps internal marketing to complete loop for web marketing and lead distribution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Mautic is simple to setup and free to use as on-premise MA tools. The web form and lead capture capabilities normally need some development job to be up and running. We can now do this without investing marketing $ for development or purchase commercial software solution.

Within my company we already use Dynamic CRM to manage pipeline. However, the way it's used is so complicated that we are not willing to connect the CRM with web front in anyway. Mautic also enable us to automatic distribute web form result to interested parties through email notification. Which helps us to respond quickly to customer inquiry and monitor the process.

One other thing we did is to use Mautic as an normal web form tool for in-bound call data entry and re-distribute  to sales people. With the built in automation this is easy to setup and start using.

Personally I did the localization for Mautic into Simplified Chinese. It takes some time but with what the product delivers it's worthwhile for us.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
As open source solution it takes some time to figure out the little tricks to setup and update Mautic. I myself have some technical knowledge about web development so this is not an issue. For other marketing people this could be a challenge. Of course they can use the cloud version.

Documentation is an area to improve for Mautic. Especially for new features, One would expect a decent user guide to start with.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
With little tech support you can save hard $ in marketing automation. The process works well for company of all size. Take a try if you are new to Marketing Automation.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated manual web form creation and lead distribution process. Release the marketing staff from in-efficient work tasks. The form and landing page cloning saves a whole lot of time for us in terms of setting up the digital marketing program.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Director for Digital Marketing & New Product Business

all_reviews.review_title: A self-hosted marketing automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Mautic is great at collecting information about visitors on your website - before you even know anything about them. It can add contacts based solely on IP, and make the connection once they fill out a form. This is great because it allows you to see what a potential customer has been doing since before they even contacted you. For example, you can tell that this was the fourth time they visited your website in the last week.

Once you know they're interested, you can use pre-created campaigns to send drip marketing emails to them on a particular interval. This seems to be the hot new thing right now, right?

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
We opted for the self-hosted version. This took some know-how to set up properly, and the follow up drip-marketing they sent us for getting started didn't totally match up with what we saw. This was confusing. Their documentation could use some help.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
If you know what you're doing, the set up isn't bad. But if you're expecting your hand to be held through the process you might want to consider another platform that you have to pay for.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're a small business and never had the budget for a full blown marketing automation platform before (they're often rather expensive). We appreciate that we can download and use the software on our own server (for free), and then own all of the information that's collected this way.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful, but Get Ready to Work
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
AgilOne is a great tool for the marketer looking to take his or her brand to the next level. This solution has been well thought out and can provide great segmentation and campaign flexibility out of the gate. The challenge is that the marketer needs to be ready to invest a lot of time into strategizing, planning and executing these new campaigns, or hiring a marketing agency to help with that.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
One of the things I dislike about the current AgilOne solution is that any of the marketing execution outside of building a customer list has to come from outside sources. The current solution doesn't provide things like email templates or best practices for campaigns that can be utilized by the marketing team or data analysts.

Recommendations to others considering Acquia Customer Data Platform:
If you are a marketer who is ready to take action on his/her data and truly create a personalized experience for your customers, AgilOne is a great tool to have on hand. If you are not ready to put time and effort into what you do, then don't waste your time. AgilOne gives the marketer what he or she needs to make a great program, but AgilOne is just the tool - the strategy and planning from the marketer are what takes this tool (data) to the next level.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
AgilOne has empowered us to personalize our marketing campaigns to a near one-to-one level. Doing so has improved our customers engagement with our marketing programs and has also allowed us to win-back a significant portion of our lapsed or lost customers. We have also been able to gain insights into our customer base and product offering that would have taken loads of hours and hardware without the help of AgilOne.

all_reviews.review_title: Mautic disrupts the Marketing Automation world!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Mautic is one of the first completely free and open source Marketing Automation systems. The best part is that Mautic's capabilities are comparable to the other systems that cost thousands of dollars per month. As a pro user with other enterprise Marketing Automation systems, I can definitely day that Mautic has the ability to compete in this space.

What do you dislike about Acquia Customer Data Platform?
Mautic is still fairly new...so despite having a very robust feature set right out of the gate, there are still some features to be desired. I am confident they will come quickly though as Mautic continues to build a following. As a frequent user of open source software, I would like to see a better communicated road map of upcoming features, or some sort of mechanism where users can vote on which features will be implemented next. Github issues are great, but they don't leave any indication on when a feature will be implemented.

What problems is Acquia Customer Data Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was able to get Mautic up and running and start using it in just a few minutes using mautic.com registration. Other MA systems have a super long sales cycle and setup before you can even begin to start using them. Integrating into my CMS was quick and easy and I was able to start building out logic in Mautic within minutes!
